channel.title: Not a moparscape question, this is a forum question. (Posts)
channel.description:
Hello... I've been on MoparScape for a few days now and I have 68, non spam, and helpful posts... yet it still says I'm a "First Time Poster" if I may ask, could anyone please tell me how many posts I need to get next rank :confused:
Ps: When I go to the "Profile" button, it says my post count is zero, but when I go to the button "My posts" it has about 5 pages, 68 posts. All replys that aren't spam will be appreciated! :D
